items.sentence: Tom made a lot of suggestions, but none of them were very good.
Tom made sure that his children ate everything on their plates.
Tom named his boat after his girlfriend, but then she left him.
Tom found it hard to believe that Mary didn\'t like him at all.
I assume it\'s impossible to know exactly when that\'ll happen.
When we started out, we didn\'t really know what we were doing.
Tom had to lend Mary some money so she could take the bus home.
Tom is probably just making a mountain out of a molehill again.
When Tom was a teenager, he earned money delivering newspapers.
This is the most comfortable chair I\'ve sat on in a long time.
